subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Cowboys sit atop the N.F.C. standings but will have to rely on either Brandon Weeden or Matt Cassel while Tony Romo sits until at least Week 11 with a broken clavicle.
snippet: The Cowboys sit atop the N.F.C. standings but will have to rely on either Brandon Weeden or Matt Cassel while Tony Romo sits until at least Week 11 with a broken clavicle.
